alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:56PM EST until January 10 at 6:16PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River near Poughkeepsie. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Minor flood stage. Minor flooding of lowlands, boat docks and boat launches. Water covers State Route 213 in Eddyville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 4.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest late this evening and fall below flood stage after 2 am. A second rise over flood stage will occur Wednesday by late in the morning. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Poughkeepsie Flood Stage: 4.2 Observed Stage at Tue 10 pm: 4.3 Forecast: Tue 11 pm 4.3 Wed 5 am 2.8 Wed 11 am 4.5 Wed 5 pm 0.3 Wed 11 pm 1.3 Thu 5 am -1.8 Thu 11 am 2.4 Thu 5 pm -0.3 Thu 11 pm 1.8 Fri 5 am -0.8 &&
